metadata.title: USN-4649-1 -- xdg-utils vulnerability
metadata.description: Jens Mueller discovered that xdg-utils incorrectly handled certain URI. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4649-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  xdg-utils - 1.1.1-1ubuntu1.16.04.4 No subscription required
